Name: Future Sight
Effect: Single Target. This Move's Damage is dealt at the beginning of the next Round. Ignore Shield Moves, Force Field, Cover, & Substitute. If the Target Retires or Switches out from Battle, the Damage will be dealt to the next Opponent or to one of its Allies.
Description: The Pok√©mon foresees something terrible happening. Although when it tries to see their own future, the images are ever changing.
